options.title: 4 Marla Plot
options.content: 4 Marla plots are ideal for buyers looking for cost-effective residential land. These plots support compact house designs with efficient layouts, making them suitable for small families or first-time property buyers.

options.title: 10 Marla Plot
options.content: 10 Marla plots are suitable for spacious independent homes with multiple rooms, open areas, and future modification potential.

options.title: 12 Marla Plot
options.content: 12 Marla plots support premium residential construction, offering enhanced comfort, privacy, and strong long-term value appreciation.

options.title: 14 Marla Plot
options.content: 14 Marla plots are ideal for luxury home projects and buyers seeking larger land parcels with high resale and investment potential.
